description:
nova/version.py has no unit tests. For inspiration on how to fix this, take a look at Swift's implementation of similar logic.

https://jenkins.openstack.org/job/nova-coverage/1080/cobertura/nova/version_py/

http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~hudson-openstack/swift/trunk/revision/301
title: nova/version.py has no unit tests
